text: hi everyone I wanted to let you know
that we have our adorable plush toys
back in stock online and ready for you
we have owl and star from Twinkle
Twinkle and snow boy and snow girl from
little snowflake they are super soft and
cuddly perfect for a little one who
loves to watch super simple songs and
they're available now on amazon.com or
the super simple store once you receive
your new friends make sure to take a
picture with them and share it on
Instagram using the hashtag super simple
official we would love to see where Al
and star snow boy and snow girl's
